data.taskTitle: Phase 1: Clone CMSaasStarter and configure base setup
Phase 1: Clone CMSaasStarter and configure base setup
data.approach: Audit current state: CMSaasStarter cloned to arkagent, Supabase configured with migrations, but need to: 1) Rename package.json to arkagent, 2) Update config.ts with Arkagent branding, 3) Add Stripe API keys to .env, 4) Update pricing plans with real Stripe product IDs, 5) Customize colors/theme in app.css, 6) Configure Cloudflare Pages deployment, 7) Make initial git commit

data.question: Need configuration details for Arkagent branding and Stripe setup

data.taskTitle: Phase 1: Clone CMSaasStarter and configure base setup
data.approach: Applying JAT blue theme adapted for light SaaS: 1) Update package.json, 2) Update config.ts with Arkagent branding, 3) Apply JAT blue colors to app.css, 4) Skip Stripe for now, 5) Make initial git commit
